transactionSet.name: Functional Acknowledgment
transactionSet.description: This Draft Standard for Trial Use contains the format and establishes the data contents of the Functional Acknowledgment Transaction Set (997) for use within the context of an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) environment. The transaction set can be used to define the control structures for a set of acknowledgments to indicate the results of the syntactical analysis of the electronically encoded documents. The encoded documents are the transaction sets, which are grouped in functional groups, used in defining transactions for business data interchange. This standard does not cover the semantic meaning of the information encoded in the transaction sets.

segment.name: Transaction Set Header
segment.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

segment.name: Functional Group Response Header
segment.description: To start acknowledgment of a functional group

dataElement.name: Functional Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a group of application related transaction sets

dataElement.name: Group Control Number
dataElement.description: Assigned number originated and maintained by the sender

segment.name: Transaction Set Response Header
segment.description: To start acknowledgment of a single transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

segment.name: Data Segment Note
segment.description: To report errors in a data segment and identify the location of the data segment

dataElement.name: Segment ID Code
dataElement.description: Code defining the segment ID of the data segment in error (See Appendix A - Number 77)

dataElement.name: Segment Position in Transaction Set
dataElement.description: The numerical count position of this data segment from the start of the transaction set: the transaction set header is count position 1

dataElement.name: Loop Identifier Code
dataElement.description: The loop ID number given on the transaction set diagram is the value for this data element in segments LS and LE

dataElement.name: Segment Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a segment

segment.name: Data Element Note
segment.description: To report errors in a data element or composite data structure and identify the location of the data element

dataElement.name: Element Position in Segment
dataElement.description: This is used to indicate the relative position of a simple data element, or the relative position of a composite data structure with the relative position of the component within the composite data structure, in error; in the data segment the count starts with 1 for the simple data element or composite data structure immediately following the segment ID

dataElement.name: Component Data Element Position in Composite
dataElement.description: To identify the component data element position within the composite that is in error

dataElement.name: Data Element Reference Number
dataElement.description: Reference number used to locate the data element in the Data Element Dictionary

dataElement.name: Data Element Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the error found after syntax edits of a data element

dataElement.name: Copy of Bad Data Element
dataElement.description: This is a copy of the data element in error

segment.name: Transaction Set Response Trailer
segment.description: To acknowledge acceptance or rejection and report errors in a transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Acknowledgment Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating accept or reject condition based on the syntax editing of the transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

segment.name: Functional Group Response Trailer
segment.description: To acknowledge acceptance or rejection of a functional group and report the number of included transaction sets from the original trailer, the accepted sets, and the received sets in this functional group

dataElement.name: Functional Group Acknowledge Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating accept or reject condition based on the syntax editing of the functional group

dataElement.name: Number of Transaction Sets Included
dataElement.description: Total number of transaction sets included in the functional group or interchange (transmission) group terminated by the trailer containing this data element

dataElement.name: Number of Received Transaction Sets
dataElement.description: Number of Transaction Sets received

dataElement.name: Number of Accepted Transaction Sets
dataElement.description: Number of accepted Transaction Sets in a Functional Group

dataElement.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

dataElement.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

dataElement.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

dataElement.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

dataElement.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

segment.name: Transaction Set Trailer
segment.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

dataElement.name: Number of Included Segments
dataElement.description: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set
